prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains one item, the uncorrected galley proof, [1946], of Memoirs of Hecate Countyby Edmund Wilson, including short stories "The Man Who Shot Snapping Turtles," "Ellen Terhune," "Glimpses of Wilbur Flick...," "The Milhollands and their Damned Soul," and "Mr. and Mrs. Blackburn at Home."
